EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-5144:Informs client that their Reg Reporting have not been entitled.
EmailTemplate.name: Reg Reporting Disclaimer
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: Regulatory Reporting Disclaimer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Please note that LE-LE static settings for Real-time and Regulatory Reporting that may be applicable to these changes HAVE NOT been setup.
These include Counterparty Non-disclosure, Indication of Collateralisation and RCP override.
If you require these to be set-up for the newly permissioned LE-LE pair these will need to be requested via email to regreporting@markitserv.com by your designated Regulatory Reporting Admin.
Regards,
MarkitSERV Client Services UK/Europe/Asia +44 (0)84 4994 7378 US and Canada +1 877 765 8737 www.markitserv.com
